first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002}{00003} branch. Your son-in-law was arrested yesterday for soliciting prostitution. This matter has had a rather negative impact. If you don't want many people to know about it, please pay the bail of 30,000 yuan as soon as possible.

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002}{00003} branch. Your son-in-law was arrested for soliciting prostitution yesterday. To keep this private, pay a bail of 30,000 yuan quickly.
What? Are you serious? How can I pay the bail? Please tell me what to do.

first_turn: Hello, this is the customer service representative from {00004}. With exams approaching, I'm not sure if your classmates need exam practice questions. Could you please fill in a moment to give you the link for ordering?

dialogue.text: Hello, this is the customer service rep from {00004}. With exams near, do your classmates want exam practice questions? I can send the order link.
Oh, that sounds helpful. Could you send the link? I think some classmates might be interested.
Great! I just need your email to send the link and details about pricing and payment.
